newsitem.headline: Android Workspace Upgrade Needed...
newsitem.text: The decision was made to delay some projects do to the lack of power my desktop has to outlut the product i wqnt to release. This is because of the memory usage and power needed by Android Studio amd Naugat 64bit processing at high compression. I am accepting donations via Google Wallet and using the funding of Licensed key purchases to back this purchase of a new development workstation. Thank you for your support!

newsitem.headline: Holiday Sale!
newsitem.text: Premium and Onyx license will be in Sale starting the end of November through December. This is your chance to lock yourself in to an array of premium projects i have to announce and display for 2017. 2 of these projects are launchers. 1 is the sequel to Sapphire Launcher... Enjoy!

newsitem.headline: Advancement
newsitem.text: The end of the year update is currently in progress for Sapphire Launcher. This update is focusing on the weird rotation bug one Pixel, Nexus and One Plus devices that i have caught thus far and reported. I will also be taking the time to patch a few ends and odds for Naugat and improve a few areas of the launcher settings. This update will also be the starting point of a droubt of updates. Its not that support has ended, its just the awakening process of a successor project taking fold. More information will be announced near new years here in the USA.

newsitem.headline: Wallpaper Archives Error
newsitem.text: Users have reported that some categories of wallpapers are not loading properly and this issue is being tracked. I have still not corrected this action as it seems to be a glitch in both ends. Please be patient.

newsitem.headline: Wanna Translate?
newsitem.text: If you are a user interested in contributing to the project by translating Sapphire Launcher for your locale, please contact me on Hangouts or the Google Plus Group. Also take a look at the Sapphire Github. https://github.com/rgocal/SUI

newsitem.headline: Progress Report!
newsitem.text: Be sure to update your reviews of Sapphire Launcher on Google Play reflecting your experience with the 12.00 update. Also report back any flaws, spelling errors or hickups you have encountered so a patch can be built. Tablet support is also important.

newsitem.headline: Update 12.00 Available!
newsitem.text: You can grab the latest update for Sapphire Launcher now! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NxIndustries.Sapphire

newsitem.headline: New Wallpapers
newsitem.text: Check the archives this weekend for new wallpapers collected from the community. Community members are welcomed to submit their own!

newsitem.headline: Update and Review Ratings
newsitem.text: Please take some time to update and review your rating on the latest version of Sapphire Launcher and any License you have purchased. Higher ratings get the launcher noticed, which increases user counts and revenue which increase the likely hood of bigger and better updates.

newsitem.headline: SUI Google Plus
newsitem.text: Join the Google Plus Group to get in on exclusive sneak peaks, dev previews, and one on one dev support!

newsitem.headline: Welcome and Thankyou for your support!
newsitem.text: Enjoy your stay, Ask questions, get involved with the communities and stay active! Sapphire UI is the community custom launcher powered by google exclusively for Android 5.0+
